CRenderQueue
struct
CRenderQueue

Implements the render queue. Render commands from the client are stored in this queue until the render thread picks them up and executes them.

Module

import Rendering.Caustic.RendererMarshaller;

Functions
AddLambda
void AddLambda(
std::
function<void()> 
func
)

Adds the specified lambda into the render's instruction queue
